page.title: 08Bredwardine; Disadvantages.
page.content: The main disadvantages of living in the area may be listed as follows - 1. Lack of public transport, creating difficulties in shopping, visiting doctors and dentists, getting essential services such as repairs, etc. 2. Access to houses on the hillside in winter - the gradient is 1 in 4, and snow and ice create a severe hazard. 3. Lack of mains water except for on the B4352 road. Elsewhere the water comes from somewhat unreliable springs. There is no main sewerage anywhere in the area. 4. Disturbance caused by low-flying aircraft; the area is overflown by training fighter aircraft and heavy military transport 'planes.
